articles.description: "He is denying that the debt pertains to him and so we felt the need to clarify to the public that yes - the debt is 100% related to his account," CoinFlex's CEO said.
articles.content:
CoinFlex said that the high-profile investor running a negative balance with the crypto exchange is Roger Ver, a long-time bitcoin evangelist.
Ver, who is also known  as "bitcoin Jesus," has denied … [+1356 chars]
